lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: There but the grace of God goes I. Also, as I get older I find myself remembering more of what my father tried to teach me. He was the most loving man I have ever known and would routinely "give the shirt off of his back" to help someone in need.

lender.name: Pd. 1 English
lender.loan_because: We want to "be the change you wish to see in the world" - Ghandi
lender.occupational_info:
We are a class of 24 seventh grade students located in Pennsylvania!
In our English class we, of course, learn how to read, analyze, and write, but we're also learning how to open our eyes to the world around us and how we can help!

lender.loan_because: We want to "be the change you wish to see in the world" - Ghandi
lender.occupational_info:
We are a class of 24 seventh grade students located in Pennsylvania!
In our English class we, of course, learn how to read, analyze, and write, but we're also learning how to open our eyes to the world around us and how we can help!

We are a class of 24 seventh grade students located in Pennsylvania!

We are a class of 26 eighth grade students located in Pennsylvania!

lender.loan_because: We want to "be the change you wish to see in the world" - Ghandi
lender.occupational_info:
We are a class of 26 eighth grade students located in Pennsylvania!
In our English class we, of course, learn how to read, analyze, and write, but we're also learning how to open our eyes to the world around us and how we can help!

lender.name: DIane
lender.loan_because: My purpose is to build loving connections with people around the world. I wish to honor those who came before me as well as those who will follow me in life on this planet. May God grant us all peace.

lender.name: Joselito
lender.loan_because: I want to venture into a direct selling business but I dont have the initial capital to pursue it.
lender.occupational_info: More on cusiomers satisfaction purpose

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.whereabouts: San Pedro Garza Garcia Nuevo Leon
lender.loan_because: Microcredits are a fantastic way to help people develop an economic sustainability which will improve their family's living standard and will certainly contribute to a whole scale social development.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a law student and have a part time job in a state government agency named Youth Institute, this office is created with the objective of giving every citizen in the state within the ages of 12 and 29 the attention they need, mainly through social development orientated programs.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone's life; helping to build a dream.
lender.occupational_info: I acquire parts and service for hospital equipment

lender.name: Lincoln and Claire
lender.loan_because: Giving a man a fish feeds him for a day. Teaching him how to fish, or in this case helping him to buy a fishing pole, feeds him for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: Lincoln helps keep power plants running to make electricity. Claire raises our children.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage two apartment communities in Kansas. I show apartments, process paperwork and hopefully help find people a new place to live.

lender.name: Kent, Mari & Luke
lender.occupation: Product Manager at Microsoft / Full-Time Mom
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to share with others that with which we've been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Kent - I'm a Product Manager at Microsoft Mari - I'm a full-time mom to our son Luke Luke - I'm a full-time handful for my mommy and daddy

lender.name: Jayaram Nair & Suma
lender.loan_because: Make the world a better place by lending a helping hand!
lender.occupational_info: IT

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I'm thankful for what God has given me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: Americans have so much and others have so little. This is a great way to spread the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I am working to change the way that people see the world and their own lives, so that our planet can be a peaceful and harmonious place to live.

lender.name: Editha
lender.loan_because: I want to raise fund for Service for Peace. It's an NGO focusing on giving service to
lender.occupational_info: Service for Peace volunteer Teacher

lender.name: Neelesh & Deepti
lender.loan_because: We can!!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because:
I see the great opportunities that microfinance makes possible, allowing people around the world to improve their financial circumstances.
"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man how to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."

lender.name: JOHN
lender.loan_because: I want to help people live a better life.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: ... I can.

lender.name: RACHEL
lender.loan_because: Women in the world should have the help they need to take care of themselves and thier family.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that provides services to individuals with developmental disabilities, enabling them to live better and more productive lives.

lender.name: jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to support women around th world.
lender.occupational_info: I have a business called Luxe Jewels. It helps women start their own home based businesses selling boutique style jewelry at home parites. Our mission is to help them find a way to thrive with a flexible schedule that let's them put their family first

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: With all the overwhelming problems in the world, I feel very fortunate to be able to make a small impact.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Administrative

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: It allows me to make a small difference in someone's life at essentially no cost.

lender.name: pauli
lender.loan_because: if you give you begin to live...

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I know that people need the assistance, and if I can help them empower themselves, then go for it!
lender.occupational_info: Fundraising for a non-profit

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: others have helped me in the past. What goes around, comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy teaching others about the world of nature that surrounds them even in the middle of a city. Becoming aware of what is present in their lives helps people to widen their perspectives and reach out to others in need.

lender.name: RonH
lender.loan_because: I am blessed by God. Jesus said, " that which you do to the least of these you do to ME."
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: It is an amazing opportunity to help in some small way to make what is hopefully a big change for the better in a person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals to help them find which food and lifestyle choices will work best for them and the life they desire.

lender.name: Rachel Coolidge
lender.loan_because: It feels right to give someone a fair chance in life and happiness which a lot of people in the world take for granted.
lender.occupational_info: Earning my Master's degree in Physician Assistant Studies at the University of Texas Medical Branch.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I study architecture and Italian.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: It is the best way to make a difference from afar.
lender.occupational_info: I create software that help the company I work for analyze their income. (Very dull and unsatisfying)

lender.name: Christa
lender.loan_because: The idea of helping people while maintaining their ability to be self-sufficient was an ideal combination.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur. I enjoy working in various industries and focus currently on the entertainment sector and international projects.

lender.name: Suzanna
lender.loan_because: I must.

lender.name: Russell Family
lender.loan_because: Our family loans because enabling people to enjoy the fruits of their labors is fulfilling.

lender.name: Alphonse
lender.loan_because: Every body has the right to live correctly. We need prosperity respecting our globe and we should share the prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I work for animal health, for the animal and his owner

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: My needs are met, I'd like to help you meet yours.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer software.

lender.name: Jolea and Jess
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate in our lives, it's nice to give back and help other people who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Matt
Roger
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept and It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to businesses.

lender.name: John & Autumne
lender.loan_because: In America, we are in the poverty level, yet in the world we are in the top 2% of the wealthiest families. The question is not why, but WHY NOT?
lender.occupational_info: We raise organic, chemical free, vegetables, raise houseplants and trees, and can pure honey from our bees.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help my poor neighbors through establishing a cooperative. This cooperative will initially open a consumer store and later on build a bakery since many of my neighbors are bakery workers but their salary can not support their family needs specially education of their children.
lender.occupational_info: At present I managed a cooperative located in one of the town of Lanao del Norte or in Lala, Lanao del Norte. But I wanted to get back to my hometown where my neighbors was 100% poor. There is great challenge on seeing people get started to help themselves and even give a decent life to their own families. .

lender.name: Deepak/Geeta/Kevin/Ronak
lender.loan_because: I am just paying it back.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: borders and boundaries should not continue the cycle of poverty experienced by so many of the world's population.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher and counsellor of high school students but my real passion comes from exposing students to global issues, political discussions and debates, particularly in the area of social change and global activism.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: The people I lend my money to are honest, earnest working individuals that need a small boost that will, in turn, reap large benefits.
lender.occupational_info: Filling my brain with all sort of knowledge and wisdom...something of that nature.

lender.name: Yadong
lender.loan_because:
I have being given a lot of opportunities in my life to improve myself. I want that someone else has an opportunity as well. I like the idea of helping people to become independent.
I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info:
Born in China and have 19 years education before coming to the States. Got my PhD in Digital Signal Processing from University of Rhode Island.Now live in the heart of Silicon Valley as a normal hard-working IT engineer with some big dreams. Active reader, like sharing the books with friends. One of my favorites books is: Bank for the poor.
My main life-going Interests: "learn new things."

lender.name: MAURO
lender.loan_because: penso sia un buon modo di aiutare la gente che ha bisogno

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: everyone should ...

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: It is a very real and direct thing to do and hopefully contributes to a better life for the people who receive the Kiva loans.
lender.occupational_info: I am a highschool teacher of Classical Studies, i.e. Latin and (ancient) Greek and Classical History

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Finally I feel I can really make a difference aiding people directly in the developping world.

lender.name: jonathan
lender.loan_because: i feel as though i have opportunties that everybody in the world should be able to access.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing is one of the greatest ideas of the past 50 years. It provides real money to real entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Neil & Vanessa
lender.loan_because: We've been lucky
lender.occupational_info: We work as walking and cycling guides in Spain & France

lender.name: Brandon
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer management and communications

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: God teaches us to help the poor.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves .
lender.occupational_info: Business Consulting

lender.name: Donnie and Ericka
lender.loan_because: The use of microloans through Kiva helps to undo what the world bank and the IMF destroy. Treat those in poverty as equals who simply lack capital. We have too much of it so give it up. Power to the people. And so begins the change.
lender.occupational_info: I sell cnady, coffee, pastries and chips in vending machines.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate, and enjoy helping people. I have been helped many times in my own life. Everyone needs a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to help themselves. I try to help them make a little sense of their finances and lives along the way! I am a perpetual student with a love of reading, thinking, and all things arts-related.

lender.name: Kayleen
lender.loan_because: I want to see entrepreneurs succeed with their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: PSW means "Personal Support Worker". In Canada, this is what we call a nurse's aide. I work for an agency which sends me to work for many patients, in hospitals, retirement homes, and private homes. I help the elderly, the disabled, the sick, and the dying. I feed them, bathe them, and help them with other tasks to make them feel clean and comfortable.

lender.name: DIRK & CLO
lender.loan_because: We can and we care.

lender.name: Hugo
lender.loan_because: I am eager to know how this works in order to promote the system across my friends because this is a very positive way to directly support people that needs help.
lender.occupational_info: no professional work anymore ( before internal sap consultant and project leader ), now doing everything I like

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I can give only a small amount, but small amounts from many can add up to enough capital to make big changes in the lives of people who have very little.

lender.name: Sahil
lender.loan_because: Giving a loan to this cause is better than not , and anything good in this world is worth believing in and KIVA has figured out a way to do this good thing in the right way.
lender.occupational_info: I design internet services for an advertising company in New York City.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: A sense of community is important to me, whether that community is the one I live in or half way around the world. I want to help out where I can and I'd like to think someone I don't know might do the same for me if needed one day. I also want my daughter to understand and appreciate the importance of sharing, contributing, giving, and receiving.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a marketing/communcations company, but my true passion is writing. I'm currently working on my first novel.

lender.name: gwen & mark
lender.loan_because: It seems like a good way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I must.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: sooner or later everyone needs a helping hand.

lender.name: Matt & Hailey
lender.loan_because: We believe much has been invested in us. It drives us to invest in others.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I let my students select the recipient.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher at Gonzaga Prep in Spokane, WA, USA

lender.name: Houston
lender.loan_because: I live for it.

lender.name: Casey
lender.occupation: Kiva Fellow Prev: Guardianship & Trust manager
lender.loan_because: I believe access to credit can be a driving force in entrepreneurial activity and skill development. These can lead to better living standards for all. I further appreciate the opportunity to "invest" in real people as opposed to corporations which have seemed to thrive on a lack of transparency in recent years.
lender.occupational_info: Previously I worked in guardianship and trust management for youth, elderly and disabled individuals. Starting 09/2009 I will be working with Edpyme Alternativa as a Kiva Fellow.

lender.name: Rose Garrett
lender.loan_because: What we may see as a small loan makes a BIG difference for a struggling entrepreneur across the world.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is possible to eliminate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to cope with health problems.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I support progress and positive action.

lender.name: Abd√ºlmecit
lender.loan_because: so little here helps so much there.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: There are so many people who really need that "hand Up" to help them succeed. My little amount may help that person to suceed.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea as I like the fact that these people are working their way to an improved living situation.
lender.occupational_info: I provide insurance that pays legal bills when people who run businesses are taken to court.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I would like to pass on the fortune I have had.
lender.occupational_info: I approve Corporate Credit and Mortgages and assist with bringing new people into providing our loans.

lender.name: Conrad
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: much has been given to me. The least I can do is return the favor.

lender.name: Debora
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky...have enough to share...as an atheist, don't see a supernatural being taking care of the desperately poor...we make our own purpose in life and helping others when we can makes life meaningful.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a break
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student of religion and when I graduate I plan to work in charitable organizations and help my parents buy a farm.

lender.name: Tula
lender.loan_because: nothing feels better than helping others

lender.name: Christopher Daggett
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy, like collecting jelly beans. I also loan to support wominnovation (http://nyti.ms/aTDcFu).
lender.occupational_info: my organization applies research insights from behavioral economics to invent fresh solutions to the world's toughest social problems.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: Access to capital is vital to every business' success.
lender.occupational_info: I've been in business for myself for over 25 years developing computer software.

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: i want to help others improve their lives
lender.occupational_info: i work in a resturant

lender.name: Rachel and Sam Davis
lender.loan_because: Love breaking down the barriers.
lender.occupational_info: Information Technology

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: my daughters gave this to me as a gift for Mother's Day. What a wonderful tribute to what I hope I have taught them.
lender.occupational_info: I work with churches of all shapes and sizes helping them to be the best they can be.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It is about kharma...good things will happen to me when I do good things for others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the distribution of auto parts,for the biggest car company in the world.

lender.name: Vancouver Youth Model UN
lender.loan_because: actions speak louder than words. Our Model UN programme seized the opportunity to not only talk about changing the world, but make a difference by acting on our beliefs.
lender.occupational_info: The Model UN club at our school hosts the city's only United Nations simulation for junior high students (Gr. 7-9) in order to engage them in the activities of the UN and its committees and agencies.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I believe if the world is to become a better place to live then we all need to start helping more. No one person can do it alone. Perhaps by lending a helping hand we can begin to achieve some type of harmony .

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It¬¥s a shame poverty still exists in the world. I sincerly hope , that these loans will help people in the developing countries, to a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I¬¥m in the insurancebusiness, helping people with insurances for their households, cars and so on. I live in the southern part of Sweden.

lender.name: Rajan
lender.loan_because: I hope this will help make someone's environment less hostile and stressful.
lender.occupational_info: Designing circuits for wireless devices.

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: I think micro financing is a good way to give a fair chance to the less fortunate people in the world

lender.name: isabelle
lender.loan_because: because i'm not there anymore. But my friends instead of buying flowers decided to give some money to Kiva.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 12 and 13 year old students how to be successful learners. My students have average or above intellects, but have learning issues such as dyslexia (reading difficulties) or dyscalculia (math difficulties).

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: cuz I want to be nice
lender.occupational_info: I like math best. Becket is my best friend.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: Twenty-five bucks and you outsource all the hard work. What's not to like?

lender.name: Bridges
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a bridge to a better place sometime
lender.occupational_info: Charity

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to do better for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites, brochures, business cards, and other materials to advertise businesses.

lender.name: Marlena
lender.loan_because: I can--and so can my students and clients. That's why I give them Kiva gift certificates!
lender.occupational_info: Athena Mentor helps international students prepare winning applications to top US colleges and MBA programs.

lender.name: giovanni
lender.loan_because: perche' posso aiutare qualcuno messo male in giro per il mondo senza alzarmi dalla sedia sperando che si ricordino di me in caso un giorno fossi messo male io

lender.name: JmeKellyAlmaTimothyKyle
lender.loan_because:
We want to connect with others around the world offering them a chance to work towards their goals, as well as a hand of friendship.
We love learning about different countries, the people who live there, and what their lives are like (including occupations and aspirations).
Business loans create greater stability, confidence, and self-reliance in individuals and families: We have faith in the vast capabilities of our borrowers to meet their goals.

lender.name: Ziv
lender.loan_because: Foregoing a few dozen dollars in interest I would have earned in a savings account in order to help raise the standard of living of people earning no more than a few dollars a day--just makes sense. Supporting small enterprises is a necessary component of our efforts to bring the very basic human essentials to the developing world.

lender.name: The CAG Family
lender.loan_because: We want connect with others around the world and learn about who they are, what they do and where they live.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of four. We work in the fields of technology and teaching.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: Those attempting to better their economic position with personal initiative should have the opportunity.

lender.name: Kristi & Jim
lender.occupational_info: She is an attorney He is a marketing exec We have two great kids

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children the value of helping others and to understand that to whom much is given much is expected.

lender.name: shannon
lender.loan_because: i should. we all should.
lender.occupational_info: i love, i learn, i teach, i laugh. besides raising my son, i take pictures, i sew, i paint, i cook.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have been loaned money which has helped me start my life. I want to repay the favor to people who deserve the chance to succeed. Kiva allows that chance to see and know who you are lending to with confidence. Giving a small amount of money that means very little to me but a lot to another person is what makes lending through Kiva so great. Change makes Change!

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: The best way to help a community is to target the people who can do the most with the money. I believe that the system of microfinancing supported by KIVA does this as each is individual is chosen through their local community. By loaning instead of donating, I can keep using the money to help people. A loan does not foster dependency.
lender.occupational_info: Teach chemistry and science to teenagers

lender.name: Amit
lender.loan_because: it is the least I can do to directly have an impact on the world.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: Playing poker does not do much for the world we live in :)
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to be a small winner at card games that I love to play. When the money I make at the tables helps others to grow and and achieve their goals as well, I enjoy it even more!

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: Because it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: People have helped me, so I should help others.
lender.occupational_info: I design electronics for jet aircraft.

lender.name: Shauna
lender.loan_because: There is an old Chinese proverb: "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." ~ I'm lending the man the money to buy the fishing pole and tackle.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I am grateful that I can provide for my family and I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people invest their money.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I know how fortunate I am. Kiva gives me the opportunity to share my good fortune. For me, it is about acknowledging my blessings, recognizing the importance of people, and doing my part to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I raise 3 children to be responsible, appreciative, and aware of the world around them. In my free time, I volunteer to conserve our precious natural resources.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I feel entrepreneurs around the world who have not been as fortunate as I deserve some assistance so that they may succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I have a business caring for children with complicated medical problems in 2 group homes.

lender.name: Kevin & Carol
lender.loan_because: I admire anyone who tries to improve thier lives through hard work.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: I am a design Engineer for an Electrical utility in northern Canada.

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way help someone who only needs a hand to get started. I just looked at my loan history - how exciting to see how many lives a small contribution can touch!
lender.occupational_info: I finally finished my Medical Transcriptionist training and started a new job, along with taking care of my 3 kids, 2 cats and a dog.

lender.name: Peggy H.
lender.loan_because: a volunteer group I belong to in my community gave me money to use with Kiva to honor the memory of my brother, James Burke. He was a familyman first and also a successful businessman.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a trauma therapist. I use a type of psychotherapy called EMDR which helps people process and heal from traumatic experiences.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I just really want to.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am a full time student in Los Angeles. I plan to one day work for a company such as kiva, and actually travel to other countries so that I can people like you!

lender.name: F.K.C.
lender.loan_because: thou...we really don't know yet how this can benefit others but we think it's cool to start sharing & reaching out early in our lives...
lender.occupational_info: ...enjoying kid's life bringing joy & happiness in our family, and we wish to all kids around the world too :)

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: I believe in the positive possibilities of helping those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I design and test computer chips. I am a single mom and live in beautiful Colorado with my young son.

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: it's a simple way to make a small positive change for someone else far away.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make our public transportation system work better.

lender.name: Habitat Threads
lender.loan_because: 1) We believe that our company should be philanthropic in order to be fully socially conscious. 2) Rather than blindly donate, we are helping people to pull themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We make socially conscious clothing for children.

lender.name: Romeo & me
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows me to be a one-person foreign aid campaign.
lender.occupational_info: I help to prepare science/engineering grant proposals and technical papers.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I like to help fellow small business entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Risto & Liz
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to give people a hand up instead of a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange financing for equipment sales. Liz is a flight attendant

lender.name: Wright Family
lender.loan_because: We all need to be concerned about the world and its people. Not just our local area but other regions of the planet. Also we felt this would be a good way to educate our daughters about other people and their lives. They have each chosen their own individuals to support and we spread our moneys among 4 different individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Biology instructor at a local Community College, I have been teaching for over 25 years. My wife Paula is a manager of a toxicology lab. Our daughters are in second and sixth grade.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: it makes me smile.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: Kiva is the coolest organization ever!
lender.occupational_info: I do grassroots marekting programs for an eco-friendly , hip soap company.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the few broadly successful strategies for helping the poor. And it is easy
lender.occupational_info: I like my work ;)

lender.name: Harri
lender.loan_because: I find that women are playing an important role in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm running an Apple based computer business.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I like to support people who are willing to create their own lives and better their own circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I run my own business called Crystal Clear Sound. I'm a musician who plays guitar and dobro (also known as a resonator guitar - see my photo). I'm also a live sound engineer who operates sound systems at events and clubs and I work to record other artists in my recording studio.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I aspire to make the world a better place for all.
lender.occupational_info: Working to end hunger in the state of Texas.

lender.name: Helj√§
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and my husband abundantly, and now we want to help others.

lender.name: Luis Pedro
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can
lender.occupational_info: I am pursuing a PhD in computational biology at CMU. This Summer (2010), I will be in Mozambique helping out HIV related organisation [http://beiraproject.org].

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I know from experience how hard it is to start a small business with too little funds, just hard work alone often isn't enough. I hope to help in giving some people that little 'push' in the back.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a professional photographer, mainly active in covering cultural events (theather, dance, concerts, ...)

lender.name: Harri
lender.loan_because: It is important for those of us who are fortunate to remember those less fortunate. What is a small amount to us makes a huge difference to others.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful way to help others help themselves!

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that it is the obligation of people who have been fortunate to help those who are not. I have been deeply touched by the efforts encouraged by Oprah and President Clinton, and am convinced that we can eradicate destitution in the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I help create software to make the paperless office a reality. Get the information you need with a single click.
Apart from that, I work out, I go to cultural and political events downtown, I read books from my local library, I recycle, and I love to travel.

lender.name: Charles McPhate
lender.loan_because: I believe improving the standard of living south of the border is the only way to solve the immigration "problem" many in this country complain about.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: My husband Paul and I have travelled extensively and appreciate the people of other countries. This is the least we can do to help those who are trying so hard to help themselves.

lender.name: Defrim
lender.loan_because: I need financial assistance to continue my studies.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, studying medical school at University of Prishtina

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: A rising tide raises all boats.
lender.occupational_info: I own a company that rents the use of beach chairs and large shade umbrellas to vacationers on the beach.

lender.name: Petri & Marja
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others, people work so hard and if they could just get a little help it makes a world of difference. It does my heart good.
lender.occupational_info: I help dr's and techs with medical care for animals. Animals are dependent on us and they get sick just like us.

lender.name: Sari ja Petja
lender.loan_because: Helping women entrepreneurs in 3rd world makes the whole world a better place to be.

lender.name: SIRCOLLINS KOPHY
lender.loan_because: MY SCHOOL I STARTED NEEDS BIG SUPPORT FOR GROWTH
lender.occupational_info: AN ESTABLISHMENT WITH A FUTURE ( A HUMBLE BEGGINING , GLBAL SUCESS)

lender.name: Anu
lender.loan_because: I love helping and giving back to those less fortunate. My heart goes out to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I participate in a program that helps save the environment one day at a time.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I am able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I study history and political science. I see this service as a way to help others out.

lender.name: Erik & Maria
lender.loan_because: Want to make a change

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I just had to try this and NIcholas Kristof's influence was too great.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help university students achieve their goals.

lender.name: Everett Rotary
lender.loan_because: World Community Service is an important mission of Rotary and Rotarians everywhere. Helping others around the world to improve their standard of living through enterprise fits this mission.
lender.occupational_info: Rotary International is the largest volunteer service organization in the world - over 1 million members. Made up of business people, Rotary Clubs throughout the world strive to improve their local communities as well as communities around the world through the ideal of "service above self." Visit www.rotary.org to learn more.

lender.name: Nicola Kiri
lender.loan_because: I see huge potential within kiva.org. I like the idea of helping someone to become more self-sufficient and successful in their own business, and believe it will help them a lot over the long-term rather than a small donation to some worldwide charity. And most importantly, I have a social conscience!
lender.occupational_info: One of my favourite quotes: "Never look down on somebody unless you're helping him up" - Jesse Jackson

lender.name: Jinesh
lender.loan_because: 'Vasudaiva Kutumbakam' - Whole world is one family
lender.occupational_info: I work for a software company. We design software to help doctors with electronic medical records and patients with patient portal. Our software helps doctor become paperless, increase efficiency and productivity. It also helps patients enhance their communication with their doctors and improve outcome measures of their respective health.

lender.name: Matt and Charmaine
lender.loan_because: Loans have helped us and we just want to spread the help around.
lender.occupational_info: Matt writes computer programs that helps make other people's jobs a little bit easier. Charmaine is a lawyer who helps the state recover tax money from fraudulent tax transactions.

lender.name: Amber & Jack
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to make a positive difference in somebody else's life

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: There's finally a way to loan person-to-person on the other side of the world, rather than to a big, faceless organization. It's empowering to me and to the person I'm helping.
lender.occupational_info: I write marketing materials to help businesses grow.

lender.name: The W Family
lender.loan_because: It's something we do as a family. We hope to connect with people and life experiences that are different from ours. It's a great way to give and care about people all over the world.

lender.name: Nigel
lender.loan_because: what better satisfaction is there in helping others empower themselves & their families.
lender.occupational_info: I develop & create children's licensed product.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am self employed and I know how important working capital is in creating a successful business. I respect all of these people trying to make a better life for themselves by asking for a hand not a hand out.

lender.name: Wesley
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: start businesses that make people happy

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and to spread good fortune.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: " Give someone a fish and they eat for a day. Teach them to fish and they eat forever." Everyone needs a helping hand. What better way to help people help themselves ?

lender.name: Andres + Emily
lender.loan_because: we can.

lender.name: Ernie
lender.loan_because:
it seems like a great way to help people help themselves and their families.
it's not charity - it's giving people a chance and a start.
it is efficient and it does not take much money to make a difference

lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I sell health-related products on the internet - this way I help people improve their health. At the same time I help small businesses to develop additional income streams.

lender.occupational_info: Mostly writing and editing... and talking about what to write, what not to write and how to edit it!

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are motivated to help themselves

lender.loan_because: I can and I like to reach out to the world..
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a city school - I also do environmental work

lender.name: Nick
lender.occupational_info: Journalist, radio broadcaster

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I love the small business spirit and if I can help someone achieve success then that means that I am doing what I'm supposed to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Real Estate agents in our company helping them to prospect, brand themselves, and generate more business. I help them develop business plans and differentiate themselves from the competition.

lender.name: Trey
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world to achieve financial stability and witness personal growth. I have spent over 2 years throughout the middle east, Iraq, Kuwait, etc, and there are many people that want better lives for their families and just dont have the resources for this!!
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer networks just like the one you are using. I make sure that people can access information throughout the web!!

lender.name: Kary
lender.loan_because: I hope to be able to help other people and Kiva was recommended to my by my brother and sister-in-law.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure new pharmaceutical drugs are safe for humans.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity to help someone I do not know in a place that I may never get to and expect no gain in return beyond the chance to do it again.

lender.name: Finnella
lender.loan_because: People who want to make life better for themselves and their familes should have a chance to do just that. Kiva allows me to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: "We can all do small things with great love, and together we can do something wonderful." - Mother Teresa

lender.name: gmichaela
lender.loan_because: sometimes it takes a small loan to get your dreams off the ground
lender.occupational_info: use my skills and talents to help others

lender.name: Tyler Smith
lender.occupational_info: When not studying, I manage and advise political and legislative campaigns. My work has many facets, including data analysis, political messaging, policy development, fundraising, copy writing, and human resources management.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: The idea of micro loans seems like a fabulous idea to help people who need a helping hand and are having trouble getting started and are not looking for government assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a company testing people for possible heart disease and stroke

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: My parents were refugees who were given a chance to rebuild their lives with help from the international community. Now I would like to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help people when they are sick, and try to keep them healthy when they are well.

lender.name: Diane, Jim, Nic and Marina
lender.loan_because: Diane and Jim both served in the Peace Corps - Diane in Honduras (87-90) and Jim in the Philippines (mid 80s). We believe in helping people to help themselves and want to carry on that tradition with our 2 children, Nicolas and Marina.
lender.occupational_info: Diane works for the U.S. Government in education creating training programs for employees. Jim runs his own home remodeling/repair business.

lender.name: Jolly
lender.loan_because: everybody needs a little help along the way
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time intellectual property (trademark) attorney for a cosmetics company and part-time muse.

lender.name: Lizella

lender.name: Miquel
lender.loan_because: I love helping others.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I believe in the potential and like the interpersonal aspect of micro-lending.

lender.name: Rebecca

lender.occupational_info: I work in an office supporting attorneys with computers and other forms of technology.

lender.name: Shevy

lender.name: Alan & Sheryl
lender.loan_because: I have huge respect for people who are creative and fully committed to their ideas. I believe entrepreneurs are those kinds of people. I would love to bless those in return for the blessings God has given to me and my family. -Sheryl
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have difficulty learning and struggle with some behavioral issues. At present I am blessed to work in the art room and love the creative atmosphere it allows me to work in.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I am the privileged descendant of poor immigrants. I owe it to my ancestors and my children to make the world somehow better
lender.occupational_info: Businessperson

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to help others in a meaningful and direct way. I can think of no better way than helping others around the world fulfill their dreams.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can still afford to.
lender.occupational_info: I make powerpoints and excel spreadsheets. Over and over and over....

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I want to. This is the work that will change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a portrait artist and poet . Faces are what I love.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want the opportunity to help someone in need. I chose Kiva because each month my small monthly donation of $25 goes directly to that person with out the adminstration costs and overhead of a larger organization.
lender.occupational_info: I write children's books both fiction and non fiction for chldren ages 2-12 years old. Currently I am producing a series of small films for children who are homeschooled. These 3-4 minute films that are shown on the Internet.

lender.name: RiKa
lender.loan_because: My father got me intersted in all things global and gave me a gift certificate to make a loan through Kiva...
lender.occupational_info: I am presently writing an Encylopedia of American Toys. It examines the relationship of toys to American society.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that I can choose the person/group that I fund rather than have someone else decide what to do with the money I lend.
lender.occupational_info: I use the Internet to tell customers about the products and services of the company I work for.

lender.name: Travelingmum
lender.occupational_info: I write articles about travel, jewelry and antiques.

lender.name: cmp
lender.loan_because:
There's a lot of entrepreneur's spirit in the developing countries, which to a large extent is un-discovered for lack of capital and lack of suitable vocational training.
I want to play my part by contributing to the capital requirements.
Kiva's goal resonates with mine.

lender.loan_because: I am fortunate that I am able to.

lender.name: mantis108
lender.loan_because: I support small business entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: We are all one world and peace begins by helping one another
lender.occupational_info: My goal is to make the world a better place. I worked as a college professor and then as a mediator in labor relations before retiring. I am now a full-time, active volunteer in my community.

lender.name: daniele

lender.name: Erin

lender.name: Supinski Family
lender.loan_because: The 'American Dream' is really everyone's dream - to build a better life for ourselves and our children. We're excited to help others achieve their success one family at a time.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I can and I care.

lender.name: Gavin
lender.loan_because: Like many others on Kiva, I have more than I need and want to share with others. I know that Kiva field partners require heavy interest from borrowers, however I hope that the loans help people to achieve greater wealth. In turn, I hope this wealth reduces the urge to take too much from the environment. In almost every case, a well preserved environment is worth more money to people who live there than a damaged environment.
lender.occupational_info: I am an English teacher in South Korea. I am also a journalist, a blogger and an editor.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I feel really bad about the enormous economic inequalities in the world today and the terrible hardships these cause. I hope that my loans can help make a positive difference in someone's life and the lives of their loved ones. One day we will all live in a better world, and it is the people who connect through organisations such as Kiva that will make it happen.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to speakers of other languages.

lender.name: Jason

lender.occupational_info: I live to give myself to a cause that is bigger than me.

lender.occupational_info: I test computer software to ensure it functions as expected

lender.name: Marla & Michael
lender.loan_because: We can see how our donations can change people's lives in a meaningful way. We support a wide range of charitable organizations but find this new model to be extremely effective and satisfying because you feel a close connection to the person or groups you are helping. You can immediately know how they will gain self-sufficiency and in such a small way you can help many improve theirs lives in a way by which they would otherwise go without.
lender.occupational_info: Marla works in Finance, Administration & Operations for a nationally syndicated radio show and has worked in this industry in various capacities since college. Michael is a residential real estate agent in Dallas who for many years worked in the film/tv commercial business as a set designer & prop man. Michael is also a wonderful painter. Einstein is our 7 year old poodle and doesn't actually do much work. He has the best job of all. We also have a 2 & 1/2 year Coton du Tulear named Coco who was rescued from a puppy mill who we adopted from a wonderful organization named UCARE in Dallas run by our friend Jane

lender.name: Juliana
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps... If we all work together, miracles can happen.

lender.name: Malcolm
lender.loan_because: Its very important to support communities in nations around the world that are developing micro-economies.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Development Director of the Mountain View Conservation and Breeding Centre Society that operates Canadian Wildlife Conservation Programs in order to help save our critically endangered wildlife species from extinction. We also teach students and interns how to care for wildlife and their natural habitats in their communities. Recently, we created a new online Education Outreach Program for teachers and students in schools and colleges everywhere.

lender.name: MATTHEW
lender.loan_because: I BELIEVE THAT I HAVE THE POWER TO BUILD A BETTER WORLD.
lender.occupational_info: I FACILITATE SOCIAL SERVICES FOR ELDERLY AND DISABLED MEMBERS OF MY COMMUNITY.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of my investment going directly to someone with a plan to use it. I hope that this kind of program truly helps people by allowing them to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I sell goods to vendors like you in America on a commission basis. I wish you much success in your venture and good luck from America!

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I make lots of stock investments expecting a $ return. Kiva is different & good as an investment directly in people lives. When one is lifted up we all are.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a large truck 8 to 10 hours a day across the USA delivering wheat, beer, truck parts, processed food, etc. to various stores and warehouses from coast to coast and Canada to Mexico.

lender.name: Mary J
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and be a part of positive change.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites for small business owners.

lender.name: Beardsley-Sales Family
lender.loan_because: I think its important to help others, especially those who have a passion for what they do. If we all do a little to make someone's life better, maybe those rewards will come back to us when we need the assistance as well.
lender.occupational_info: I plan parties and make sure that everyone is having a good time. I turn people's events dreams into reality.

lender.name: Rupa & Ram
lender.loan_because: Helping someone to break free from the shackles of poverty and enhance their lives is such a great return on our (small) investments. Together we can make the world a better place.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much.

lender.name: Dwayne Shelton
lender.occupation: Toll Free numbers for small businesses
lender.loan_because: I feel that small businesses need help that is not funded. I have lots of friends with Kiva, 20 in counting. and we believe in networking to help eachother. My friends on here have been asking me to join, since im a big giver!,
lender.occupational_info: our company sells toll free numbers to small businesses to make them appear as large businesses to make large money. It's only $2.00 dollars instant activation. you can choose 800, 877, 866 888 That's how I would describe my work.

lender.name: Ina & Pooches
lender.loan_because: In loving memory of my son, who was always borrowing from me.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: it is a very good opportunity to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves putting in computer systems that allow my company to track information on each of our employees worldwide. I also help to make sure our employee's get paid correctly and on time.

lender.name: Mandie
lender.loan_because: We're all better off when we take the time to help one another. Good fortune grows when shared!
lender.occupational_info: I provide computer and technology support at a University.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: of susan, loving friend/sil/confidante, who left too soon (1966-2006). she always made things possible.
lender.occupational_info: i make technical jargon easier to understand.

lender.name: Ink On Lint
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, we know first hand the difficulties a start up business can face. Many people assisted in our success, now its time for us to give back.

lender.name: Greg's daughter
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Domestic engineer, community and school volunteer

lender.name: Willie
lender.loan_because: We are involved in the small herbal manufacturing of herbal Tinctures, Oils and teas. We would like to expand but need new equipment.
lender.occupational_info: Herbal products manufacturer

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I would like to help end poverty.
lender.occupational_info:
I have solved a rubix cube.
I have been to Asia, Europe, North America.
I am a member of 4 different frequent flier programs.
The majority of my friends, have been my best friends for over 10 years.
I think the Catholic church is cool.
I created a dancing robot for my senior project at UT.
My first dog was named Tex.
I have completed 3 triathlons.
I am currently working on adding a new word to Wikipedia.. Tomachuck.
I am 1/3 owner of a potentially multi-million dollar company.
My character on Tiger Woods Golf looks just like me... and is better than John's and Sunil's character.
I love waffles.
I take bad photos
I have a beautiful baby, Kenna Grace Crowley.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want people to have the same opportunities that I've had in life.
lender.occupational_info: I make people's lives easier.

lender.name: Quincy
lender.loan_because: Economic opportunity solves so many problems.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager in a large software company that caters to the hospitality market.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I like to help people have a better life

lender.name: Alpine Games
lender.loan_because: It makes a direct, positive, and lasting difference in the lives of people, it fosters goodwill, and it betters our world. Use your blessings for blessing!

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much in this life. Most of what I have was handed to me by generations of white, male privilege. I'm excited to begin giving back.
lender.occupational_info: Learning as much as I can before being set loose on the world.

lender.name: Al
lender.loan_because: I love helping people; Just the thought of helping others is more satisfying then doing nothing at all. Giving, Sharing or even lending a helping hand can be very gratifying, It also sends a good message, the right message that people do care around the World.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Each of us, working together can make a positive difference in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a mid size, family owned company that supplies other organizations with advertising, custom publication,public relation and online service needs.

lender.name: Jun & Viola
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Brandi
lender.loan_because: a little can go a long way!

lender.name: ckowyong
lender.loan_because: I'm just grateful that I can :O)

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I want to
lender.occupational_info: Start new businesses

lender.name: Donna and Mark
lender.loan_because: just because.
